sentences.en: Along the thousands miles of river way and seacoast, there are many pharos placed there.
sentences.cn: 在我国长达数千公里的河道和海岸沿线, 分布着数量众多的航标灯.

sentences.en: Armenia lacks a seacoast or a port.
sentences.cn: 亚美尼亚没有海岸和港口。

sentences.en: Fight to the finish in defence of northern China and the seacoast.
sentences.cn: 为保卫华北和沿海各地而血战到底.

sentences.en: It can be the filtration layer of the dikes, river canal, seacoast, concrete and retaining walls.
sentences.cn: 可以做堤坝, 河渠, 海岸, 混凝土,挡土墙的过滤层.

sentences.en: Our language goes current along the seacoast.
sentences.cn: 我们的语言通用于沿海一带.

sentences.en: So the seacoast will be pastures, With caves for shepherds and folds for flocks.
sentences.cn: 番2:6沿海之地要变为草场 、 其上有牧人的住处和羊群的圈.

sentences.en: The Coast guard also positively participation, 6 150 tonner seacoast patrol boats also during construction.
sentences.cn: 海岸警卫队也积极参与进来, 6艘150吨级的海岸巡逻艇也在建造之中.

sentences.en: The group's boat capsized in rough seas as the pirates raced away from patrolling warships off the coast of Somalia. 3 other pirates aboard the boat were rescued on the nearby seacoast.
sentences.cn: 据悉，他们在躲避索马里海域巡逻的军舰时遇到风浪，船被打翻，船上的另外3名海盗在附近海岸获救。

sentences.en: Then the king appointed Cendebeus commander - in - chief of the seacoast and gave him infantry and cavalry forces.
sentences.cn: 王便委派耕德巴为海滨地带的总司令,将步兵和骑兵都交给他.

sentences.en: Woe to you inhabitants of the seacoast, O nation of Cherethites!
sentences.cn: 5沿海之地的居民, 基利提族的民哪,你们有祸了!

trans.tran_en: land bordering on the sea; a coast
